articles.title: Mass. lawmakers hold hearing on immigration bill that would ban police from asking about status
articles.description:
The bill, known as the Safe Communities Act, was proposed in response to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.

The post Mass. lawmakers hold hearing on immigration bill that would ban police from asking about status appeared first on Boston.com.
